#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

typedef long long LL;

int main()
{
    int test;
    scanf("%d", &test);
    while(test--)
    {
        int n;
        LL e=0, o=0;
        scanf("%d", &n);
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            LL num;
            scanf("%lld", &num);
            if(num &1)
                o++;
            else
                e++;
        }
        printf("%lld\n", (o*e));
    }
}
